verses.verse: At <WG1722> that <WG1565> time <WG2540> Herod <WG2264> the tetrarch <WG5076> heard <WG191> <WG5656> of the fame <WG189> of Yeshuw`a <WG2424>,

Whereupon <WG3606> he promised <WG3670> <WG5656> with <WG3326> an oath <WG3727> to give <WG1325> <WG5629> her <WG846> whatsoever <WG3739> <WG1437> she would ask <WG154> <WG5672>.

And <WG2532> straightway <WG2112> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> constrained <WG315> <WG5656> his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101> to get <WG1684> <WG5629> into <WG1519> a ship <WG4143>, and <WG2532> to go before <WG4254> <WG5721> him <WG846> unto <WG1519> the other side <WG4008>, while <WG2193> <WG3739> he sent <WG630> the multitudes <WG3793> away <WG630> <WG5661>.
